Pemkot Bekasi Setop Terbitkan Surat Tugas Ormas Jaga Parkir Minimarket
05 Nov 2019, 23:27 by Isal Mawardi
Bekasi - Pembekalan surat tugas jaga parkir minimarket oleh ormas di Kota Bekasi menimbulkan kisruh. Badan Pendapatan Daerah (Bapenda) Kota Bekasi pun akhirnya tak lagi menerbitkan surat tugas tersebut.
"Sudah tidak ada lagi, sudah habis. Kita nggak terbitkan lagi," ujar Kepala Bapenda Bekasi Aan Suhanda di kantor Wali Kota Bekasi, Jalan Ahmad Yani, Bekasi Selatan Kota Bekasi, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Aan menyebut masa berlaku surat tugas ke ormas itu sudah berakhir sejak 31 September 2019. Ia akan mengevaluasi kembali soal surat tugas tersebut.
"Udah saya setop (surat tugas), kita sudah evaluasi, kita lagi bicarakan dengan Indomaret-Alfamart dengan pusat dan apa yang terbaik. Pada intinya kan itu ada potensi pendapatan kalau Bapenda kan sepanjang itu ada aturannya ya wajib digali itu," ujarnya.

Bekasi City Government Stops To Issue Duty Letter For Civil Society Organizations To Keep Minimarkets Parking
05 Nov 2019, 23:27 by Isal Mawardi
Bekasi - The provision of a minimarket parking duty by a mass organization in Bekasi City has caused chaos. The Bekasi City Regional Revenue Agency (Bapenda) finally no longer issued the assignment letter.
"It's not there anymore, it's gone. We don't publish anymore," said Head of Bekasi Bapenda Aan Suhanda at the Bekasi Mayor's office, Jalan Ahmad Yani, Bekasi Selatan Bekasi City, Tuesday (11/05/2019).
Aan said the validity period of the assignment letter to the mass organization had expired since September 31, 2019. He would re-evaluate the matter of the assignment letter.
"I have stopped (the assignment letter), we have evaluated it, we are discussing it with Indomaret-Alfamart with the center and what is the best. In essence, there is income potential if Bapenda, as long as there are rules, it must be explored," he said.
